statements: SELECT date, location, temperature FROM historical_weather_data
SELECT location, precipitation FROM historical_weather_data WHERE temperature > 25
SELECT location, precipitation, wind_speed FROM historical_weather_data WHERE location = 'New York City'
SELECT date, precipitation, wind_speed FROM historical_weather_data WHERE temperature < 10
SELECT * FROM historical_weather_data ORDER BY temperature DESC
SELECT date, location, temperature, precipitation, wind_speed FROM historical_weather_data WHERE temperature > 20 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT location, MAX(temperature) AS max_temperature FROM historical_weather_data GROUP BY location ORDER BY max_temperature DESC
SELECT location, AVG(precipitation) AS avg_precipitation FROM historical_weather_data WHERE precipitation > 0 GROUP BY location ORDER BY avg_precipitation DESC
SELECT date, location, AVG(temperature) AS avg_temperature FROM historical_weather_data WHERE location = 'New York' GROUP BY date, location ORDER BY date ASC
SELECT * FROM historical_weather_data WHERE temperature < 10 AND precipitation < 5 AND wind_speed > 15 ORDER BY location, date DESC
SELECT * FROM historical_weather_data WHERE city_id = 1
SELECT temperature, date FROM historical_weather_data WHERE city_id = 2 ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT city_id, date, weather_condition FROM historical_weather_data WHERE temperature > 25
SELECT trip_id, trip_name FROM trip_planning ORDER BY trip_id
SELECT * FROM trip_planning WHERE city_id = 3 AND date = '2022-06-15'
SELECT city_id, date, temperature, weather_condition FROM historical_weather_data WHERE city_id = 1
SELECT city_id, date, weather_condition FROM historical_weather_data WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY city_id ASC
SELECT city_id, AVG(temperature) AS avg_temperature FROM historical_weather_data GROUP BY city_id ORDER BY avg_temperature DESC
SELECT trip_id, city_id, date, trip_name FROM trip_planning WHERE trip_name LIKE 'Summer%' OR trip_name LIKE '%Vacation'
SELECT trip_id, city_id, date, trip_name FROM trip_planning WHERE city_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT * FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 25
SELECT location_name, longitude, latitude FROM locations ORDER BY location_name ASC
SELECT id, date, temperature FROM weather_data WHERE date = '2023-01-15'
SELECT * FROM trip_plans WHERE planned_activities LIKE '%beach%'
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM locations ORDER BY latitude DESC
SELECT id, date, temperature FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM locations WHERE latitude < 40 AND longitude > -100;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM locations ORDER BY location_name ASC;
SELECT id, date, description FROM weather_data WHERE description LIKE '%sunny%' AND temperature > 20;
SELECT id, location_id, date, planned_activities FROM trip_plans WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM historical_weather_data
SELECT city_id, temperature, humidity FROM historical_weather_data WHERE temperature > 25
SELECT city_id, date FROM historical_weather_data ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT city_id, date, temperature FROM historical_weather_data WHERE city_id = 2
SELECT city_id, temperature, humidity FROM historical_weather_data WHERE humidity < 60 ORDER BY temperature DESC
SELECT city_name, temperature, humidity FROM cities JOIN historical_weather_data ON cities.city_id = historical_weather_data.city_id
SELECT * FROM historical_weather_data WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT attraction_name, rating FROM attractions WHERE rating >= 4.5
SELECT city_name, start_date, end_date FROM cities JOIN trips ON cities.city_id = trips.city_id ORDER BY start_date ASC

SELECT city_name, temperature, humidity FROM cities JOIN historical_weather_data ON cities.city_id = historical_weather_data.city_id WHERE temperature BETWEEN 20 AND 30 AND humidity < 70 ORDER BY city_name
SELECT * FROM City;
SELECT city_name, country, region FROM City ORDER BY country DESC;
SELECT id, name, age, nationality FROM Tourist WHERE age > 30;

SELECT trip_date, city_name, weather_condition FROM Trip JOIN City ON Trip.city_id = City.id JOIN TripWeather ON Trip.id = TripWeather.trip_id JOIN WeatherData ON TripWeather.weather_id = WeatherData.id;

SELECT city_name, trip_date, temperature FROM Trip JOIN City ON Trip.city_id = City.id JOIN TripWeather ON Trip.id = TripWeather.trip_id JOIN WeatherData ON TripWeather.weather_id = WeatherData.id WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT * FROM City;
SELECT tourist_id, city_id, trip_date FROM Trip ORDER BY trip_date DESC;
SELECT name, age, nationality FROM Tourist WHERE age > 30;
SELECT city_name, country, region FROM City WHERE region = 'Europe';
SELECT trip_id, weather_id FROM TripWeather WHERE trip_id IN (SELECT id FROM Trip WHERE tourist_id = 1);
